video.title: Oggy et les Cafards
video.synopsis: Wimpy blue cat Oggy would like nothing more than to snooze, but he's constantly bothered by the three ugly cockroaches who have invaded his home.

episodes.synopsis: Oggy gets chocolates for his birthday. / The roaches take over Jack's brain. / The roaches steal Oggy's fries. / Oggy puts a lock on the fridge.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The roaches take a nap in the CD player. / Jack gets a cold. / The roaches overfill Oggy's coffee maker. / Jack is building a skyscraper.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: The roaches take the key to Oggy's fridge. / Jack organizes a birthday party for Oggy. / Oggy is transformed into a giant roach. / Oggy falls in love.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Oggy breaks his mirror. / Jack asks Oggy to hold on to a case filled with money. / Oggy loses a baby tooth. / The roaches hijack Oggy's toy train.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: Oggy makes a remote control for his lawn mower. / Oggy discovers that his stomach is huge. / Oggy takes his driving test. / A mouse raids Oggy's food.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Oggy plays with his doll. / Oggy catches the roaches in an empty can. / Oggy sets up to spy on the roaches. / Oggy awakens to a cry for help.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Oggy takes in a stray dog. / Jack takes Oggy fishing. / Oggy and Jack take off in a plane. / Jack and Oggy go to dinner in the city.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Oggy decides to go on a diet. / Jack wants to take Oggy rock climbing. / The roaches steal Jack's cake. / Jack and Oggy win the lottery.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: DeeDee falls into a yogurt container. / The roaches lock Oggy out of the bathroom. / Oggy catches the roaches red-handed. / Oggy and Jack go fishing.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Oggy has a bad case of the hiccups. / Oggy needs to take a bath. / Extraterrestrial cockroaches invade the kitchen. / It's Oggy's Granny's birthday.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Jack starts acting like a dictator. / Oggy finds some old love letters. / The roaches play with Jack's brain. / Jack tries to assemble a roach trap.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Oggy goes to the carnival. / Oggy brings home a snail. / Oggy decides to make a documentary about the roaches. / Dee Dee gets struck by lightning.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Jack decides to give Oggy's house a makeover. / Oggy tries to escape a pesky cloud. / Jack and Oggy catch a duck. / Oggy tries to make a magic flute.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: A turkey finds its way into Oggy's yard. / Oggy is scared as he watches a horror movie on TV. / Oggy and Jack play chess. / Oggy gets a new toy.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Jack takes Oggy camping. / Oggy puts a lock on the fridge. / Oggy throws the roaches out on Christmas Eve. / The roaches find one of Oggy's costumes.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: Oggy is hypnotized by TV. / Jack and Oggy race their remote-controlled cars. / Oggy is scared by a horror show. / The roaches overfertilize the yard.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: The roaches get caught in a trap. / Jack is taking Oggy to the seaside. / Jack creates an insecticide that goes wrong. / Oggy finds a genie.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Oggy and Joey get sucked into the electrical system. / A hungry moth invades Oggy's house. / Oggy is catnapped. / Jack headlines at the opera.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Joey falls in love with a little bee. / Oggy goes to the seaside on his scooter. / Jack and Oggy ride in a hot-air balloon. / Oggy is in the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Oggy encounters a witch with a magic broom. / Oggy discovers a strange gun in the attic.
episodes.title: Episode 20
